parameters.name: Option
parameters.description: Display characteristics of all of the components not selected to isolate as defined in swIsolateVisibility_e

title: IAssemblyDoc.SetIsolateVisibility
description: Sets the display characteristics of all of the components not selected to isolate.

parameters.name: Option
parameters.description: Display characteristics of all of the components not selected to isolate as defined in swIsolateVisibility_e

remarks:
Before you
exit isolate
, you can
save the display characteristics to a new display state
, which you can access from the ConfigurationManager. If you do not save before exiting isolate, then the display returns to its original state.
